name: v8codecov
description: V8 Code Coverage json / object outputs for CSS and JS (soon). This helps you receive the V8 Code Coverage objects from Chrome/Chromium DevTools, which are only viewable in the DevTools window, as of Chrome 63. This package allows you to work on those extracted CSS usage objects. Suggested usage: Performance analytics for webpages/ PWAs.
author: Karan Sapolia sapoliakaran@gmail.com
